Package io.wcm.siteapi.processor.caconfig

Interface ContextAwareConfigurationPropertyMapper<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Target object type
All Superinterfaces:
io.wcm.sling.commons.caservice.ContextAwareService
@ConsumerType public interface ContextAwareConfigurationPropertyMapper<T> extends io.wcm.sling.commons.caservice.ContextAwareService
Defines custom mappings of context-aware configuration property values to a re-mapped target value or target structure (e.g. with nested maps).

  • Field Summary

    PROPERTY_ACCEPTS_CONTEXT_PATH_EMPTY, PROPERTY_CONTEXT_PATH_BLACKLIST_PATTERN, PROPERTY_CONTEXT_PATH_PATTERN

    • accept

      Checks if this mapper accepts the given property.
      Parameters:
      value - Source value from context-aware configuration.
      metadata - Property metadata
      request - Request with context resource
      Returns:

      Maps a property value.

      request - Request with context resource
